title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Category Of The Weapon, and Number of incidents in each Category Of The Weapon on the y axis.

Legally obtained is higher than any other categories with value 82.0, followed by Unknown/to be determined, and Illegally obtained. Down to category Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally with the lowest value of 1.0.
The highest value at Legally obtained is almost 82.0 times larger than the minimum value of Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.
